data.distance_method: How Distance to a Zone is determined
data.waze_region: Waze Region - Location of the Waze Route Server
data.waze_min_distance: Minimum Distance from a zone before Waze Route Service is used
data.waze_max_distance: Maximum Distance from a zone to use the Waze Route Service. Calculation method will be used instead.
data.waze_realtime: Determine Travel Time using Real Time Data

data.waze_history_database_used: Save Waze Route Info to the Waze History Database
data.waze_history_max_distance: Maximum Distance to store the Waze Route Time/Distance Data
data.waze_history_map_track_direction: Travel Direction used to display Waze History Data Points on a map
data.cancel_update: CANCEL THE UPDATE - Return to the Main Menu

data.stat_zone_still_time: Still time before placing into a Stationary Zone
data.stat_zone_base_latitude: Base Location Latitude - Home North-South Offset or GPS Latitude
data.stat_zone_base_longitude: Base Location Longitude - Home East-West Offset or GPS Longitude
data.cancel_update: CANCEL THE UPDATE - Return to the Main Menu

data.name: '_name' - Friendly Name of the Device
data.badge: '_badge' - A badge showing the Zone Name or distance from the Home zone
data.trigger: '_trigger' - Last event that triggered a location update
data.last_update: '_last_update' - Last time the location was updated
data.next_update: '_next_update' - Next time the location will be updated
data.last_located: '_last_located' - Last time the was located using iCloud or iOS APP location
data.travel_time: '_travel_time' - Waze Travel time to a TrackFrom zone
data.zone_distance: '_zone_distance' - Distance from a TrackFrom zone that was used in the last update
data.waze_distance: '_waze_distance' - Distance from a TrackFrom zone from the Waze Route Service
data.calc_distance: '_calc_distance' - Distance from a TrackFrom zone (straight line) that was calculated
data.travel_distance: '_travel_distance' - Distance (Waze or Calculated) from the last update
data.gps_accuracy: '_gps_accuracy' - GPS acuracy of the last location coordinates
data.dir_of_travel: '_dir_of_travel' - Direction of Travel (Towards, AwayFrom, inZone, etc)
data.zone: '_zone' - The HA Zone Name the Device is in if it in a Zone (Example: the_shores)
data.zone_title: '_zone_title' - A formatted Zone Name (Example: The Shores)
data.zone_fname: '_zone_fname' - The Zone's FriendlyName (Example: The Shores Development)
data.zone_timestamp: '_zone_timestamp' - When the Device entered the Zone
data.last_zone: '_last_zone' - The HA Zone Name the Device is in if it in a Zone
data.last_zone_name: '_last_zone_name' - A formatted Zone Name of the last zone the Device was in
data.last_zone_title: '_last_zone_title' - A formatted Zone Name of the last zone the Device was in
data.info: '_info' - Information displayed related to location updates, data accuracy, errors, etc
data.poll_cnt: '_poll_cnt' - The combined totals for iCloud locates, iOS App locates and errors
data.last_zone_fname: '_last_zone_fname' - The Zone's FriendlyName of the last zone the Device was in
data.cancel_update: CANCEL THE UPDATE - Return to the Main Menu

sensors.title: Sensors that will be created by iCloud3

data.cancel_update: CANCEL THE UPDATE - Return to the Main Menu
